name: 鄭有進
objective: 人類在從事數學演算、推理交談、觀察等各類動作時，均展現出 ”智慧”的現象。人工智慧即是利用電腦結合基本理論在有限度的範圍內從事上述各項工作，其中涵蓋了－自然語言了解、機器人學、電腦視覺、類神經網路、專家系統、自動化定理證明等，而本課程則主要在於提供必要之基礎，主要內容包括：1.搜尋法則，2. 命題與敘述邏輯，3. 定理證明，4. 知識系統與知識表達， 5. 機器學習， 6. 基因與演化計算，7. 智慧型代理人。
schedule:
1 Ch 1: Introduction to Prolog Set up environment
2 Ch 2: Syntax and Meaning of Prolog Program
3 Ch 3: List, Operators, Arithmetic
4 Ch 4: Using Structures: Example Programs
5 Ch 5: Controlling Backtracking
6 Ch 6: Input and Output
7 Ch 7: More Built-in Predicates
8 Ch 8: Programming Style and Technique 
9 Midterm, Ch 11: Basic Problem-Solving Strategies
10 Ch 12: Best-First Heuristic Search
11 Ch 13: Problem Decomposition and AND/OR Graphs
12 Ch 14: Constraint Logic Programming
13 Ch 15: Knowledge Representation and Expert Systems
14 Ch 15: Knowledge Representation and Expert Systems
15 Ch16: An Expert System Shell
16 Selected topics
17 Selected topics
18 Final exam
scorePolicy:
# homework (6~8 programming assignments), 30%
# midterm and final, 60%
# attendance and quizzes, 10%
